title: Mans Best Friend
description: A full stack MERN Application which is designed to create a network of pet owners

title: Pill Coach
description: A front-end/back-end application which is designed to help keep track of prescriptions and when to take doses. Contains some logic that sets a calendar event for each dose needed

title: Top 5
description: An application built with Bootstrap that pulls in the top 5 fantasy football players based on position and other parameters. Will also give you 5 sports bars near you utilizing the Yelp API

title: Friend Finder
description: A Express Application which will take in user survey results and will create a match with another user based on both users answers

title: Psychic Game
description: A psychic game where a letter is generated randomly and the user has to guess the letter in 9 guesses. Early exposure to Javascript

title: NYT Book Search
description: An Application using the New York Times API to pull in articles based on user search paramaters.

title: Sandwich Cafe
description: A Sandwich Logger application which uses Node and MySQL to query and route data, and Handlebars to render the HTML.

title: Bamazon
description: An Amazon-like storefront utilizing MySQL. The app will take in orders from customers and deplete stock from the store's inventory.

title: Trivia Game
description: a Trivia Game using JavaScript for the logic and jQuery to manipulate HTML. Answer the questions before time runs out.

title: Lire-Node-App
description: A command line Node application that takes in user parameters and updates information retreived from various API's.

title: Giftastic
description: An application utilizing the GIPHY API, which dynamically adds Giph's to the page based on user input

title: Train Schedule
description: A train schedule application that incorporates Firebase and Moment.js to provide up-to-date information about various trains, namely their arrival times and how many minutes remain until they arrive.

title: Crystal Game
description: A Crystal Collector game using jQuery to dynamically update a simple HTML page
